Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires the Triborough bridge and tunnel authority reimburse certain individuals from transit deserts
Summary: Requires the Triborough bridge and tunnel authority to reimburse certain individuals from transit deserts when they travel into the central business district who need medical treatment or are providing religious services; provides that such reimbursement shall be one hundred percent of all associated fees.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to providing reimbursement for certain individuals residing in transit deserts
